div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Oct. 4, 1892. CONTRIBUTIONS FOR THE ST. MICHAEL ARCHANGEL CHURCH

body.p: The following organizations made contributions for the St. Michael Archangel Church in South Chicago:

(1) Blessed Heart of Jesus Society of St. Stanislaus Kostka Parish, $50; (2) Mutual Benefit Society of the Blessed Virgin of the Holy Scapular, $15; (3) St. Valentine Society Number 1 of St. Stanislaus Kostka Parish, $25; (4) St. Joseph Society of St. Hedwig's Parish, $12; (5) St. Adalbert Society of St. Stanislaus Kostka Parish, $20; (6) St. Peter and Paul Society of St. Stanislaus Kostka Parish, $30; (7) St. Hyacinth Society of St. Stanislaus Kostka Parish, $5.80; (8) St. Stanislaus Bishop and Martyr Society of St. Stanislaus Kostka Parish, $11.70; (9) St. Joseph's Young Men Society of St. Stanislaus Kostka Parish, $10; (10) Knights of the Holy Name of Mary, Number 1, of the Immaculate Conception Parish of South Chicago, $25; (11) St. John III Sobieski Society of the Immaculate Conception Parish of South Chicago, $25;
(12) St. Casimir's Young Men Society of St. Stanislaus Kostka Parish, $55; (13) Holy Cross Society of St. Hedwig's Parish, $12. Heartfelt thanks are extended to the members of the above-named societies for their willing and generous support.
Pastor of St. Michael Archangel Parish
